definitions.definition: The unique name by which any device attached to a computer network is known.
A computer or other network device's Internet domain name ; a fully qualified hostname .
The portion of a computer's Internet domain name that comes before the first period ; an unqualified hostname .

main_definition: ( networking ) The unique name by which any device attached to a computer network is known.
secondary_definitions: ( computing , Internet ) A computer or other network device's Internet domain name ; a fully qualified hostname .
( computing , Internet ) The portion of a computer's Internet domain name that comes before the first period ; an unqualified hostname .
